step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice job squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to make the motion a bit smoother.
You're doing great! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back.
Second rep, looking good. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement.
Excellent squeeze! Ensure your elbows stay relaxed throughout the motion.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! Keep up the great work with your breathing and shoulder movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply when rolling back to help with breathing and oxygen flow. Keep up the good work!
